mapper.insert: insert into user(username, name, birth, email, gender, age) values (#{username}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{age});
mapper.select: select username from user where name = #{name} and birth = #{birth} and email = #{email}
select count(*) from user where username = #{username} and email = #{email}
select username, name, birth, email, gender from user where username = #{username}
select date_format(recent_rating_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') "recent_rating_datetime", rating_count from user where username = #{username}
mapper.update: update user set recent_rating_datetime = #{rating_datetime}, rating_count = rating_count + 1 where username = #{user_id}
